description:
Model checking that gets issues solved

BIMcollab Zoom is the only model checking solution smoothly integrated with BIM coordination. Easily combine models, analyze object properties and find clashes faster than ever with intuitive model checking.
Find issues, communicate them and verify solutions. Visualize and share customized views with stakeholders and empower them to address design issues in the early stages of the project.
Improvements/minor changes
- Users can now use regular expressions (regex) or simple operators in specifications to define values more flexibly.
- Users can now select multiple entities in specifications, eliminating the need to duplicate the specification for each entity.

Bug Fixes
- Resolved a rotation issue in model coordination with georeferencing for files that define True North.
- Fixed issues in Smart views where the “Remove” action was not always respected depending on the order of operations.
- Fixed an issue where walls and openings showed no elements when using “zoom to.”
